AR 47. The undertaking may also distinguish between short-, medium- and long-term targets
covering the same policy commitment. For example, the undertaking may have a longterm
target to achieve an 80% reduction in health and safety incidents affecting the workers of a
given supplier by 2030 and a near-term target to reduce their overtime hours of delivery
drivers by x% while maintaining their income by 2024.
